title: Side Effect of Champion Mastery
body:
Insta locking in normals has gone through the roof.

Had a guy on a "500 game grind" with Veigar and insta locked and went mid no matter what

Resulting in the Malz who called mid to troll.

replies.body:
Ive never had this at all, a guy on a grind is not a side effect of the new CM.
This has got nothing to do with it.
when he says he's grinding Mastery points, thats entirely what its about...

And as I said, I havent had this happen at all.
For me, everyone's been nice and calm about it. No insta-locks nothing. And Ive been playing for days now.
Not sure if its your bracket or if you guys are unlucky.

Because I think this is awesome.
Dunno if its a coincidence but yeah alot of A lockers recently (more then usual)

How many games do you even need with this system to have max mastery? Does it take into account the games from before this was implemented or am I gonna have to play like another 200 games on a champ I already have 200 games on or something.

Yeah, it seems to be pretty common. I had someone lock in Miss Fortune support because they didn't get the role they want, saying that they were almost level 4 mastery.

of course, that player was me but it's still not something I agree with{{champion:18}}
